title: Wondery CEO Hernan Lopez wants to make the Marvel of podcasts
description:
Wondery CEO Hernan Lopez, whose company specializes in long-form, narrative podcasts like “Dirty John”, talks with Recode’s Peter Kafka about the state of the podcast industry and how his business has weathered the pandemic. He also discusses the impact of recent federal wire fraud and money laundering charges related to his last job, as a Fox TV executive. Later, The Ringer’s Alyssa Bereznak, swings by to discuss her new podcast Boom/Bust, which details the rise and fall (and rise again?) of the hit mobile game HQ Trivia.

﻿Featuring: Hernan Lopez (@WonderyMedia), CEO of Wondery Media
Alyssa Bereznak (@alyssabereznak), tech and culture writer for The Ringer, host of Boom/Bust
Host: Peter Kafka (@pkafka), Senior Editor at Recode
